contents:
WE'VE ARRIVED.
TROY JUST GOT A WHOLE NEW NAIL CARE EXPERIENCE.
Located in Long Lake Plaza, a prominent and well-known shopping center offers easy access and ample parking in a relaxed atmosphere, rated #1 shopping center in Troy over 30 years.  With a focus on quality and service, Blossom Nails & Spa offer manicure, pedicure and waxing packages in our brand-new spacious spa facility. 
With a staff of spa professionals and a full range of spa treatments, we've got something for everyone in life - even that little princess!  Call us to make an appointment.
BUSINESS HOURS
appointment preferred...
walk-ins welcome!!!
MONDAY - SATURDAY
10:00AM - 7:30PM
SUNDAY
---Closed---
